accessibility.text: The simple recipe for user authentication
Ask the user for a login and password and send it to the server (HTTP/POST request)
The simple recipe for user authentication
Ask the user for a login and password and send it to the server (HTTP/POST request)
Verify the login/password based on information stored on the server (usually in the database)
The simple recipe for user authentication
The simple recipe for user authentication
Ask the user for a login and password and send it to the server (HTTP/POST request)
Verify the login/password based on information stored on the server (usually in the database)
Start a session once the user has been authenticated
Grant access to resources according to the session
The simple recipe for user authentication
